interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: essence | Welcome to Miami Eyeshadow Palette | 12 Highly Pigmented, Blendable Shades | Matte & Metallic | Vegan & Cruelty Free | Made Without Oil, Fragrance, Parabens, Alcohol, & Microplastic Particles
Review Date: 2022/08/26
Store: essence cosmetics
Product Description: ["¡BIENVENIDOS A MIAMI! With the essence welcome to MIAMI eyeshadow palette, we're bringing the sunny vibes of Florida into our make-up bags. The bright and bold color palette is inspired by the iconic Miami beaches and art deco landmarks. The 12 highly-pigmented are sure to create a feeling of happiness with their nude, pink, violet, turquoise and green shades. Thanks to the diverse finishes ranging from matte to metallic, you can create countless looks for any occasion. This product is vegan & cruelty free and is formulated without oil, fragrance, parabens, alcohol, & microplastic particles."]
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'essence cosmetics', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Metallic, Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals, Unscented', 'Material Type Free': 'Fragrance Free, Oil Free, Alcohol Free, Microplastic Particle Free, Paraben Free', 'Product Dimensions': '6.73 x 2.52 x 0.47 inches; 3.25 Ounces', 'Item model number': '934930', 'Manufacturer': 'essence cosmetics', 'Country of Origin': 'China'}
Review Text: This is a nice palette of 12 various shades.  It comes in a flip case with a mirror.  They are very pigmented, and were fun to play with.  I went all out on the shimmery dark pink and gold, as I've always wanted to try bright shimmery shadow. The colors are very buildable and there was minimal fallout.  I loved how bright these are and how well they show up on my skin tone. Great for a wow look!
Review Title: Fun bright colors!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Precious LUXURY CAVIAR GEL CREAM-sheer and weightless,rich with precious caviar extract,full of vitamins and minerals.Smooth skin.Light texture,quickly absorbed. 1.7fl.oz(50Ml) {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.56 x 2.56 x 2.24 inches; 4.8 Ounces'} I really want to give this product 5 stars, but the heavy perfumey smell is what downgrades it to a 4 star review.

Other than that, this product is GREAT for the face. It is chock full of great ingredients of the skin, and looks like a super high end spa face cream. I love that it has caviar extract in it, which makes it not run-of-the-mill. It absorbs so quicky into the skin and leaves my face feeling soft and supple for days afterward.

If only it didn't have such a strong perfume smell, then I'd wear it more often. If you are sensitive or allergic to perfumed creams, then I would skip this. The smell lingers heavily all day. Nice facial cream, but heavy on the perfumes. JUNG SAEM MOOL OFFICIAL] JUNGSAEMMOOL Minifying Cica Mist Balm JUNG SAEM MOOL {'Brand': 'JUNG SAEM MOOL', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Country/Region Of Origin': 'Republic of Korea', 'Package Dimensions': '3.23 x 3.07 x 1.14 inches; 2.08 Ounces'} This is a Korean face balm, that is supposed to sooth sensitive skin and cover up redness on the skin. The instructions and all the ads on Amazon are in Korean, and I HIGHLY recommend that the sellers switch this to include English instructions. I had to go to their website in order to find out the ingredients and what it was supposed to do for the skin, and most people aren't going to do that.
To continue, the balm contains 2 plant ingredientspine sprouts and centella asiatica roots. The cica pine water helps sooth and moisturize sensitive skin. The color in the balm comes from calamine powder, which helps cover red areas of the skin. It is a 100% vegan formula. The balm comes in a compact with a puff applicator. The puff is eco-friendly and anti-bacterial. This is meant to be applied as the last step during the skincare routine and before you apply your makeup.

Overall, I found this product easy to apply. You dip the poof into the cream balm, and then apply it to the skin. It has an almost creamy texture on the skin, and absorbs in quickly. It has a slight white cast when I used it but that went away as it absorbed in. I was hoping to use this as a color corrective on red areas on my skin before I applied concealer (I currently do not use foundation). Overall I think it is nice, but it really hasn't gotten rid of any redness on my skin. I do like the way it feels though and I think it helps my makeup go on smoother, so I plan to keep using it. Calming face balm essence | Welcome to Miami Eyeshadow Palette | 12 Highly Pigmented, Blendable Shades | Matte & Metallic | Vegan & Cruelty Free | Made Without Oil, Fragrance, Parabens, Alcohol, & Microplastic Particles essence cosmetics ["¡BIENVENIDOS A MIAMI! With the essence welcome to MIAMI eyeshadow palette, we're bringing the sunny vibes of Florida into our make-up bags. The bright and bold color palette is inspired by the iconic Miami beaches and art deco landmarks. The 12 highly-pigmented are sure to create a feeling of happiness with their nude, pink, violet, turquoise and green shades. Thanks to the diverse finishes ranging from matte to metallic, you can create countless looks for any occasion. This product is vegan & cruelty free and is formulated without oil, fragrance, parabens, alcohol, & microplastic particles."] {'Brand': 'essence cosmetics', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Metallic, Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals, Unscented', 'Material Type Free': 'Fragrance Free, Oil Free, Alcohol Free, Microplastic Particle Free, Paraben Free', 'Product Dimensions': '6.73 x 2.52 x 0.47 inches; 3.25 Ounces', 'Item model number': '934930', 'Manufacturer': 'essence cosmetics', 'Country of Origin': 'China'} This is a nice palette of 12 various shades. It comes in a flip case with a mirror. They are very pigmented, and were fun to play with. I went all out on the shimmery dark pink and gold, as I've always wanted to try bright shimmery shadow. The colors are very buildable and there was minimal fallout. I loved how bright these are and how well they show up on my skin tone. Great for a wow look! Fun bright colors!
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Skincare and Makeup Enthusiast:** The user exhibits a keen interest in high-quality skincare products with beneficial ingredients and is now exploring makeup options, particularly vibrant and versatile eyeshadow palettes that cater to creative expression.
- **Texture Preference:** Continues to favor lightweight, quickly absorbed formulations in skincare, while also appreciating blendable and pigmented textures in makeup products.
- **Sensitivity to Fragrance:** Maintains a sensitivity to strong fragrances, consistently prioritizing options in both skincare and makeup that are formulated without fragrances and other potential irritants.
- **Quality over Quantity:** Values premium, luxury formulations, whether in skincare or makeup, and is willing to invest in products that provide effective results and innovative solutions.
- **Critical Evaluator:** Approaches product reviews with discernment, providing thoughtful feedback based on personal experiences, indicating a focused evaluation of product efficacy and ease of use.
- **Color Exploration:** Recently embraced a preference for bold and bright colors in makeup, enjoying the creativity and versatility they offer while maintaining standards for high pigmentation and minimal fallout. The user appreciates makeup products that enhance their unique skin tone and allow for vibrant looks without compromising on quality.
